name: Orbicle Bio
description: Developer of next-generation biofertilizers specifically designed for rice farming. Their biofertilizer leverages methanotrophs and methylotrophs to convert methane emissions into plant growth stimulants, addressing both environmental and agronomic challenges.
one_liner: Developer of next-generation biofertilizers specifically designed for rice farming. Their biofertilizer leverages methanotrophs and methylotrophs to convert methane emissions into plant growth stimulants, addressing both environmental and agronomic challenges.
